sect1.title: NOT
sect1.para: Return the logical complement of the argument.

sect2.title: Arguments
sect2.para: A single argument that must evaluate to a Boolean.

sect2.title: Returns
sect2.para: Returns the logical complement of the argument expression.

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: make “foo not true ; foo == false make “foo not false ; foo == true make “foo false make “bar not and :foo true ; bar == true
